incident_updates.body: Workaround : When PXE starts up, you can press the escape key to boot directly on the disk and bypass the malfunction. We are continuing to investigate this issue

incident_updates.body: Start time : 25/07/2023 18:30 UTC Service impact : Video quality via KVM may be degraded for servers running a Windows or WinPE OS. This malfunction only impacts ADV3 servers with a B550D4U-2T motherboard and does not prevent the server from operating normally. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 17/08/2023 04:30UTC End time : 17/08/2023 05:30 UTC Service impact : Some servers are unreachable. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be replacing network equipment with defective ports.

Start time : 17/08/2023 21:00 UTC End time : 18/08/2023 01:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will do an operation on a network equipment.

Start time : 19/08/2023 10:00 UTC End time : 19/08/2023 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on a network equipment.

Start time : 20/08/2023 22:00 UTC End time : 21/08/2023 04:00 UTC Service impact : Servers will be temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes each during the maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are moving servers inside the same rack.

Start time : 21/08/2023 02:00 UTC End time : 21/08/2023 03:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unavailable for servers in rack GRA0326A04B during maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Start time : 21/08/2023 04:00 UTC End time : 21/08/2023 05:00 UTC Service impact : Servers will be temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes each during the maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are moving servers inside the same rack.

Start time : 22/08/2023 04:30 UTC End time : 22/08/2023 05:00 UTC Service impact : Servers Are temporarily unreachable during the maintenance. Service improvement : Our teams have to reload the Vrack device of the E102G14 rack.

Start time: 03/10/2023 08:00 UTC End time: 03/11/2023 10:50 UTC Service impact: The Debian-8-based rescue system (rescue64-pro) will no longer be available after 03/10/2023 Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to remove the Debian-8-based rescue system (rescue64-pro) for all Baremetal products. Customers should start using the new Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer). The old Web interface is no longer present on the new version. Please follow this procedure to troubleshoot hardware problems: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-dedicated-servers-hardware-diagnostics?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0043506
